name: hosts
description: The –H/--hosts flag takes the value of the host to which requests will be sent.You can specify multiple addresses separated by commas without spaces.

name: count
description: The –C/--count flag specifies the number of requests that will be sent to each host (default is 1).

name: file
description: The –F/--file flag contains the path to the file with the list of addresses divided into lines.

name: output
description: The –O/--output flag contains the path to the file where you want to save the output. If not specified, the output is sent to the console.
